description.value: This chime's carvings depict skulls and other grim icons. When activated, it creates an aura of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fear] in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] for 1 round. Creatures in the aura must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:27|traits:uncommon,emotion,enchantment,fear,mental|showDC:all] save. On a failure, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure). Affected creatures can't reduce their frightened condition below frightened 1 while the chime is ringing. You can Sustain the Activation to sustain the aura, up to a total of 5 rounds. This chime can be used only once per day, whether or not you Sustain the aura.
